00107 /*      and the code magic begins here [8^)     */
00108 unsigned int
00109         SOIL_load_OGL_texture
00110         (
00111                 const char *filename,
00112                 int force_channels,
00113                 unsigned int reuse_texture_ID,
00114                 unsigned int flags
00115         )
00116 {
00117         /*      variables       */
00118         unsigned char* img;
00119         int width, height, channels;
00120         unsigned int tex_id;
00121         /*      does the user want direct uploading of the image as a DDS file? */
00122         if( flags & SOIL_FLAG_DDS_LOAD_DIRECT )
00123         {
00124                 /*      1st try direct loading of the image as a DDS file
00125                         note: direct uploading will only load what is in the
00126                         DDS file, no MIPmaps will be generated, the image will
00127                         not be flipped, etc.    */
00128                 tex_id = SOIL_direct_load_DDS( filename, reuse_texture_ID, flags, 0 );
00129                 if( tex_id )
00130                 {
00131                         /*      hey, it worked!!        */
00132                         return tex_id;
00133                 }
00134         }
00135         /*      try to load the image   */
00136         img = SOIL_load_image( filename, &width, &height, &channels, force_channels );
00137         /*      channels holds the original number of channels, which may have been forced      */
00138         if( (force_channels >= 1) && (force_channels <= 4) )
00139         {
00140                 channels = force_channels;
00141         }
00142         if( NULL == img )
00143         {
00144                 /*      image loading failed    */
00145                 result_string_pointer = stbi_failure_reason();
00146                 return 0;
00147         }
00148         /*      OK, make it a texture!  */
00149         tex_id = SOIL_internal_create_OGL_texture(
00150                         img, width, height, channels,
00151                         reuse_texture_ID, flags,
00152                         GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_2D,
00153                         GL_MAX_TEXTURE_SIZE );
00154         /*      and nuke the image data */
00155         SOIL_free_image_data( img );
00156         /*      and return the handle, such as it is    */
00157         return tex_id;
00158 }
00159 
00160 unsigned int
00161         SOIL_load_OGL_HDR_texture
00162         (
00163                 const char *filename,
00164                 int fake_HDR_format,
00165                 int rescale_to_max,
00166                 unsigned int reuse_texture_ID,
00167                 unsigned int flags
00168         )
00169 {
00170         /*      variables       */
00171         unsigned char* img;
00172         int width, height, channels;
00173         unsigned int tex_id;
00174         /*      no direct uploading of the image as a DDS file  */
00175         /* error check */
00176         if( (fake_HDR_format != SOIL_HDR_RGBE) &&
00177                 (fake_HDR_format != SOIL_HDR_RGBdivA) &&
00178                 (fake_HDR_format != SOIL_HDR_RGBdivA2) )
00179         {
00180                 result_string_pointer = "Invalid fake HDR format specified";
00181                 return 0;
00182         }
00183         /*      try to load the image (only the HDR type) */
00184         img = stbi_hdr_load_rgbe( filename, &width, &height, &channels, 4 );
00185         /*      channels holds the original number of channels, which may have been forced      */
00186         if( NULL == img )
00187         {
00188                 /*      image loading failed    */
00189                 result_string_pointer = stbi_failure_reason();
00190                 return 0;
00191         }
00192         /* the load worked, do I need to convert it? */
00193         if( fake_HDR_format == SOIL_HDR_RGBdivA )
00194         {
00195                 RGBE_to_RGBdivA( img, width, height, rescale_to_max );
00196         } else if( fake_HDR_format == SOIL_HDR_RGBdivA2 )
00197         {
00198                 RGBE_to_RGBdivA2( img, width, height, rescale_to_max );
00199         }
00200         /*      OK, make it a texture!  */
00201         tex_id = SOIL_internal_create_OGL_texture(
00202                         img, width, height, channels,
00203                         reuse_texture_ID, flags,
00204                         GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_2D,
00205                         GL_MAX_TEXTURE_SIZE );
00206         /*      and nuke the image data */
00207         SOIL_free_image_data( img );
00208         /*      and return the handle, such as it is    */
00209         return tex_id;
00210 }

00212 unsigned int
00213         SOIL_load_OGL_texture_from_memory
00214         (
00215                 const unsigned char *const buffer,
00216                 int buffer_length,
00217                 int force_channels,
00218                 unsigned int reuse_texture_ID,
00219                 unsigned int flags
00220         )
00221 {
00222         /*      variables       */
00223         unsigned char* img;
00224         int width, height, channels;
00225         unsigned int tex_id;
00226         /*      does the user want direct uploading of the image as a DDS file? */
00227         if( flags & SOIL_FLAG_DDS_LOAD_DIRECT )
00228         {
00229                 /*      1st try direct loading of the image as a DDS file
00230                         note: direct uploading will only load what is in the
00231                         DDS file, no MIPmaps will be generated, the image will
00232                         not be flipped, etc.    */
00233                 tex_id = SOIL_direct_load_DDS_from_memory(
00234                                 buffer, buffer_length,
00235                                 reuse_texture_ID, flags, 0 );
00236                 if( tex_id )
00237                 {
00238                         /*      hey, it worked!!        */
00239                         return tex_id;
00240                 }
00241         }
00242         /*      try to load the image   */
00243         img = SOIL_load_image_from_memory(
00244                                         buffer, buffer_length,
00245                                         &width, &height, &channels,
00246                                         force_channels );
00247         /*      channels holds the original number of channels, which may have been forced      */
00248         if( (force_channels >= 1) && (force_channels <= 4) )
00249         {
00250                 channels = force_channels;
00251         }
00252         if( NULL == img )
00253         {
00254                 /*      image loading failed    */
00255                 result_string_pointer = stbi_failure_reason();
00256                 return 0;
00257         }
00258         /*      OK, make it a texture!  */
00259         tex_id = SOIL_internal_create_OGL_texture(
00260                         img, width, height, channels,
00261                         reuse_texture_ID, flags,
00262                         GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_2D,
00263                         GL_MAX_TEXTURE_SIZE );
00264         /*      and nuke the image data */
00265         SOIL_free_image_data( img );
00266         /*      and return the handle, such as it is    */
00267         return tex_id;
00268 }

00270 unsigned int
00271         SOIL_load_OGL_cubemap
00272         (
00273                 const char *x_pos_file,
00274                 const char *x_neg_file,
00275                 const char *y_pos_file,
00276                 const char *y_neg_file,
00277                 const char *z_pos_file,
00278                 const char *z_neg_file,
00279                 int force_channels,
00280                 unsigned int reuse_texture_ID,
00281                 unsigned int flags
00282         )
00283 {
00284         /*      variables       */
00285         unsigned char* img;
00286         int width, height, channels;
00287         unsigned int tex_id;
00288         /*      error checking  */
00289         if( (x_pos_file == NULL) ||
00290                 (x_neg_file == NULL) ||
00291                 (y_pos_file == NULL) ||
00292                 (y_neg_file == NULL) ||
00293                 (z_pos_file == NULL) ||
00294                 (z_neg_file == NULL) )
00295         {
00296                 result_string_pointer = "Invalid cube map files list";
00297                 return 0;
00298         }
00299         /*      capability checking     */
00300         if( query_cubemap_capability() != SOIL_CAPABILITY_PRESENT )
00301         {
00302                 result_string_pointer = "No cube map capability present";
00303                 return 0;
00304         }
00305         /*      1st face: try to load the image */
00306         img = SOIL_load_image( x_pos_file, &width, &height, &channels, force_channels );
00307         /*      channels holds the original number of channels, which may have been forced      */
00308         if( (force_channels >= 1) && (force_channels <= 4) )
00309         {
00310                 channels = force_channels;
00311         }
00312         if( NULL == img )
00313         {
00314                 /*      image loading failed    */
00315                 result_string_pointer = stbi_failure_reason();
00316                 return 0;
00317         }
00318         /*      upload the texture, and create a texture ID if necessary        */
00319         tex_id = SOIL_internal_create_OGL_texture(
00320                         img, width, height, channels,
00321                         reuse_texture_ID, flags,
00322                         SOIL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, SOIL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X,
00323                         SOIL_MAX_CUBE_MAP_TEXTURE_SIZE );
00324         /*      and nuke the image data */
00325         SOIL_free_image_data( img );
00326         /*      continue?       */
00327         if( tex_id != 0 )
00328         {
00329                 /*      1st face: try to load the image */
00330                 img = SOIL_load_image( x_neg_file, &width, &height, &channels, force_channels );
00331                 /*      channels holds the original number of channels, which may have been forced      */
00332                 if( (force_channels >= 1) && (force_channels <= 4) )
00333                 {
00334                         channels = force_channels;
00335                 }
00336                 if( NULL == img )
00337                 {
00338                         /*      image loading failed    */
00339                         result_string_pointer = stbi_failure_reason();
00340                         return 0;
00341                 }
00342                 /*      upload the texture, but reuse the assigned texture ID   */
00343                 tex_id = SOIL_internal_create_OGL_texture(
00344                                 img, width, height, channels,
00345                                 tex_id, flags,
00346                                 SOIL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, SOIL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_X,
00347                                 SOIL_MAX_CUBE_MAP_TEXTURE_SIZE );
00348                 /*      and nuke the image data */
00349                 SOIL_free_image_data( img );
00350         }
00351         /*      continue?       */
00352         if( tex_id != 0 )
00353         {
00354                 /*      1st face: try to load the image */
00355                 img = SOIL_load_image( y_pos_file, &width, &height, &channels, force_channels );
00356                 /*      channels holds the original number of channels, which may have been forced      */

00358                 {
00359                         channels = force_channels;
00360                 }

00363                         /*      image loading failed    */
00364                         result_string_pointer = stbi_failure_reason();
00365                         return 0;
00366                 }
00367                 /*      upload the texture, but reuse the assigned texture ID   */
00368                 tex_id = SOIL_internal_create_OGL_texture(
00369                                 img, width, height, channels,
00370                                 tex_id, flags,
00371                                 SOIL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, SOIL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Y,
00372                                 SOIL_MAX_CUBE_MAP_TEXTURE_SIZE );
00373                 /*      and nuke the image data */
00374                 SOIL_free_image_data( img );
00375         }
00376         /*      continue?       */
00377         if( tex_id != 0 )
00378         {
00379                 /*      1st face: try to load the image */
00380                 img = SOIL_load_image( y_neg_file, &width, &height, &channels, force_channels );

00383                 {
00384                         channels = force_channels;
00385                 }
00386                 if( NULL == img )
00387                 {
00388                         /*      image loading failed    */
00389                         result_string_pointer = stbi_failure_reason();
00390                         return 0;
00391                 }
00392                 /*      upload the texture, but reuse the assigned texture ID   */
00393                 tex_id = SOIL_internal_create_OGL_texture(
00394                                 img, width, height, channels,
00395                                 tex_id, flags,
00396                                 SOIL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, SOIL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Y,
00397                                 SOIL_MAX_CUBE_MAP_TEXTURE_SIZE );
00398                 /*      and nuke the image data */
00399                 SOIL_free_image_data( img );
00400         }
00401         /*      continue?       */
00402         if( tex_id != 0 )
00403         {
00404                 /*      1st face: try to load the image */
00405                 img = SOIL_load_image( z_pos_file, &width, &height, &channels, force_channels );
00406                 /*      channels holds the original number of channels, which may have been forced      */
